ygData.subject: Re: Well I finnaly hit 20 ..
ygData.msgSnippet: The other night I played in Oasis for about 6 hours and got 1 bubble within lvl 20. Then this morning my co-op was closed for school so I got to play for an
ygData.messageBody:
The other night I played in Oasis for about 6 hours and got 1 bubble within lvl 20. Then this morning my co-op was closed for school so I got to play for an extra 2 hours, and boom! I hit lvl 20. I cheered and yelped and ran off to buy my new spells.

- Force Shock
- Tashans Clash
- Elemental Skin
- Enstill

And later tonight I am going to go back to Fewlthiwe and buy my gate spells *cheers*
Well, after I got my spells I had 30 mins before I had to logoff for the night. So I am all pumped up not a single kill in my belt under lvl 20, so I run off

- Cast Tashans Clash - does a 2 - 3 second stun.
- Cast Enstill (65 mana) RESISTS!
- Cast Force Shock (120 mana if I recall) RESISTS!

There goes a VAST majortiy of mana,. I yell oh shit, dish out a few shock of ice since it was the only spell I had mana for basicly and run around yelling help.

What a dissapointment *grin* going to do some playing around tonight and see if I have better luck. I think that either

a) Croc's have a high resistance against force spells and enstill
b) I need to kill a few things with those spells first (easier things) before they start working.

Not sure which is what, but all I know is that after the whole deal was done I was 80 or so hp within loseing lvl 20
